meanings: [명사] refusal, rejection, denial, (formal) rebuff, [동사] refuse, reject, deny, turn down, (정중하게) ( f) decline

vlive.korean: 저는 기분 안 나쁘게 거절... I can say no without hurting the other person's feelings. 듣기 View video OSEN : PENTAGON 펜타곤, 귀여운 2인 1조 TMI 인터뷰 #스타로드 05
vlive.english: I can say no without hurting the other person's feelings.

examples.korean: The offer was too enticing to refuse. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 제의는 너무 유혹적이어서 거절하기가 어려웠다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The offer was too enticing to refuse. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He flatly refused to discuss the matter. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 그 문제에 대한 논의를 딱 잘라 거절했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He flatly refused to discuss the matter. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He refused to attend out of sheer perversity. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 그저 순전히 삐딱한 마음에서 참석을 거절했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He refused to attend out of sheer perversity. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It would have been impolitic to refuse his offer. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 제의를 거절했다면 현명하지 못한 일이 될 뻔했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It would have been impolitic to refuse his offer. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They received a negative reply. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 거절하는 대답을 들었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
